verses.verse: <S%H2142>Remember,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> what has come on <S%H7200>us:<s%> Look, and <S%H7200>see<s%> our <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
Our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> Our <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H5237>aliens.<s%>
We are <S%H3490>orphans<s%> and <S%H369>fatherless;<s%> Our <S%H517>mothers<s%> are as <S%H490>widows.<s%>
We have <S%H8354>drunken<s%> our <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H3701>money;<s%> Our <S%H6086>wood<s%> is sold to <S%H935>us.<s%>
Our <S%H7291>pursuers<s%> are on our <S%H6677>necks:<s%> We are <S%H3021>weary,<s%> and have no <S%H5117>rest.<s%>
We have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> To the <S%H804>Assyrians,<s%> to be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
Our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and are <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5445>more;<s%> We have borne their <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
<S%H5650>Servants<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H6561>us:<s%> There is none to deliver us out of their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
We <S%H935>get<s%> our <S%H3899>bread<s%> at the peril of our <S%H5315>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>Because<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
Our <S%H5785>skin<s%> is <S%H3648>black<s%> like an <S%H8574>oven,<s%> <S%H6440>Because<s%> of the <S%H2152>burning<s%> heat of <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
They <S%H6031>ravished<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> The <S%H1330>virgins<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
<S%H8269>Princes<s%> were hanged <S%H8518>up<s%> by their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> The <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H2205>elders<s%> were not <S%H1921>honored.<s%>
The young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H2911>mill;<s%> The <S%H5288>children<s%> <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> under the <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
The <S%H2205>elders<s%> have <S%H7673>ceased<s%> from the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> The young <S%H970>men<s%> from their <S%H5058>music.<s%>
The <S%H4885>joy<s%> of our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7673>ceased;<s%> Our <S%H4234>dance<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H60>mourning.<s%>
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from our <S%H7218>head:<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to <S%H2398>us!<s%> for we have sinned.
For this our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1739>faint;<s%> For these things our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H2821>dim;<s%>
For the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> which is <S%H8074>desolate:<s%> The <S%H7776>foxes<s%> walk on <S%H1980>it.<s%>
<S%H3068>You,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H3427>remain<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> Your <S%H3678>throne<s%> is from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
Why do you <S%H7911>forget<s%> us <S%H5331>forever,<s%> And <S%H5800>forsake<s%> us so <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H3117>time?<s%>
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> us to <S%H3068>yourself,<s%> Yahweh, and we shall be <S%H7725>turned.<s%> <S%H2318>Renew<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> as of <S%H6924>old.<s%>
But you have <S%H3988>utterly<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3966>us;<s%> You are very angry against <S%H7107>us.<s%>
